A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Simply awful. Odd character development for the new\, poor treatment of the old. Strange humor\, massive plot holes. The choices made to address the burning questions from the force awakens were narratively and emotionally terrible. Did nothing to address the scale problem of the first movie. If the First Order is strong enough to take over the “galaxy” (I’ll assume a small one) you’re still talking about a military apparatus with billions of people. If your resistance effort is down to the 400 or so people left on a ship\, then forget about it\, the war is over. Cinematography was spectacular\, so it had that going for it.
